pma:database.name: webshop
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `orders` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(11) NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `totalPrice` double(10,2) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `address` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `express` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), CONSTRAINT `userId` FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=20 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
